Name: Arrow
Description: Usable with a shortbow or longbow.

Name: Crossbow Bolt
Description: Usable with a light crossbow, hand crossbow, heavy crossbow, or repeating crossbow.

Name: Slingshot Pellet
Description: Usable with a slingshot. Though slingshots can fire any small stone, spherical projectiles are preferable for their consistent accuracy. Common materials for purpose-made slingshot ammo are iron, lead, glass, or clay
